  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="65177" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="65177" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.21</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="3138">3,138</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="306"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Invictus Victory</b> by <b>Rabanne</b> is a Oriental fragrance for men. <b>Invictus Victory</b> was launched in 2021. Top notes are Pink Pepper and Lemon; middle notes are Olibanum and Lavender; base notes are Vanilla, Tonka Bean and Amber. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read                             <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-up"></i>
                                 </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">13</span></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">109</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Low longevity and sillage for an EDP Extreme
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-up"></i>
                                 </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">11</span></div>

                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>

                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">135</span></div>

                    </div>
                    May remind some of old cigarettes
                </div>
                    </div>
    </div>

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="65177"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.83058930759063; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.91.jpg" style="width: 2.925rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Pink-Pepper-91.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Pink Pepper</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.77.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lemon-77.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lemon</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.84529946162075; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.95.jpg" style="width: 3rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Olibanum-Frankincense--95.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Olibanum</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.81530224448182; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.1.jpg" style="width: 2.85rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lavender-1.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lavender</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.74.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vanilla-74.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vanilla</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.99049106974986; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.73.jpg" style="width: 3.925rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Tonka-Bean-73.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Tonka Bean</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.94222822930411; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.54.jpg" style="width: 3.575rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Amber-54.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Amber</div></div></div>

  <span>
    This perfume reminds me of
  </span>
</div>
<div class="carousel">
            <div class="carousel-cell">
            <a href="">
                <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.29897.jpg" alt="Dark Temptation AXE">
                <span class="brand">AXE</span>
                <br>Dark Temptation
            </a>
        </div>
            <div class="carousel-cell">
            <a href="">
                <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.46038.jpg" alt="Pure XS Rabanne">

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2363735" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2363735" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Celico"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2013065"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Celico" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Lover-89720.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89720.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Lover"title="Le Male Lover"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2363735ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2363735" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2013065">Celico</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-28">11/28/24 01:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh god. So much pepper.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2363735"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2363735#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2342573" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2342573" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pokemon.1809"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1430414"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1430414.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pokemon.1809" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Carbon-43402.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43402.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa Carbon"title="Luna Rossa Carbon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2342573ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2342573" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1430414">pokemon.1809</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-08">11/08/24 17:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For me, this fragrance is the ultimate ruler of contemporary scents. Whether you believe it or not, my opinion isn't going anywhere! :P</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2342573"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2342573#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329636" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2329636" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sighying"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2229478"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2229478.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sighying" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2329636ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2329636" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2229478">sighying</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-27">10/27/24 18:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's been a bit overhyped imo, but that doesnt make it bad at all. The spiciness with a hint of chocolate has grown on me and it smells quite mature, but also the right amount for a teen. Its really warm and I feel like im drinking a hot chocolate when it first hits my nose. Also it's a really versatile scent for the colder season so it's good for any occasion school /work /going out</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2329636"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2329636#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2311707" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2311707" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mr.Mtl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2256350"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mr.Mtl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2311707ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2311707" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2256350">Mr.Mtl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-10">10/10/24 19:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nostalgia in a bottle. I loved dark temptation as a kid and this is a higher end version of that same scent. Absolutely goated. Maybe a little heavy on the vanilla / sweetness but definitely same scent profile. If they added a bit of red pepper in this it'd be game over<br />
<br />
Projects loud initially<br />
Good longevity<br />
Good sillage</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2311707"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2311707#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2304256" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2304256" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Trendkill97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1094278"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1094278.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Trendkill97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Black-Aoud-1142.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1142.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Aoud"title="Black Aoud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2304256ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2304256" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1094278">Trendkill97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-04">10/04/24 00:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a scent that only works in air-conditioned spaces, or the colder days outdoors, on warmer conditions this makes me gag something out the milky nuances in this is off-putting. In concept, the freshness fizzy uplifting bright pink pepper with the darker sweet warm notes is interesting, but hasn't quite completely been a successful execution IMO. It has a mass-appealing quality in the air but feels a bit like a chemical mess when smelt up close. This is a toned-down, simpler robust version of Pure XS without the boozy notes and the sharp zing. It does have a slight chocolatey vibe from Axe Dark Temptation too, but isn't quite it fully. Overall, it's a nice approach to tweaking the Invictus line by Paco Rabanne, but somehow falls short in some areas.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2304256"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2304256#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2293026" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AtLast883"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2264607"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AtLast883" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2293026ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2293026" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2264607">AtLast883</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-23">09/23/24 18:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Warm, sweet, floral and citrusy. This really smells like what a young man would believe to be wealthy, sexual and playful. Still very much a designer presentation, but rather mature if you are young and maybe too juvenile if you are older. The top notes are fresh and balanced, not intoxicating but quickly die off and you're left with the base of vanilla, chocolate, and amber a hour or two after use. Some people may find this fragrance lackluster, but I would doubt many would find it offensive. Silage seems to be pretty proportional to spraying. The choice is yours to make this a skin scent or room filler.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2293026"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2293026#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2287422" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I blind bought this (like basically everything I have) and I like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2287422"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2287422#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2274106" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2274106" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rr690"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1322949"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="rr690" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Moschino/Uomo-730.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.730.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Uomo?"title="Uomo?"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2274106ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2274106" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); Nothing really wowed me and if you've ever tried every other warm/spicy fragrance this won't wow you at all. On my skin it was a strong 7-8 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2274106"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2274106#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2273169" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2273169" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Evus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2071244"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2071244.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Evus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65177.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Invictus Victory"title="Invictus Victory"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2273169ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2273169" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2071244">Evus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-05">09/05/24 22:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first blind buy fragrance<br />
It has good longevity 7-8 hours on my skin<br />
The projection is strong  for the first 1-2 hours<br />
<br />
in my opinion <br />
9.2/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2273169"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2273169#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2272190" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2272190" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AmirMerobe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044874"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AmirMerobe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2272190ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2272190" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044874">AmirMerobe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-05">09/05/24 04:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is 1 Million Royal but more softer, lighter and less sweet (i think they cloned Royal from Invictus Victory with a bit of twist) therefor i could be worn in summer night time.<br />
Having both is redundant in my opinion since i get the same vibe from both but Invictus Victory more easy to wear but the performance not like Million Royal, the performance of Million Royal much better in terms of longevity and sillage.<br />
<br />
Overall it's good but not groundbreaker, it's generic and not unique if you are used on 1 Million line this will be very boring and disappointing since it doesn't offer something new. The same vibe, time of use and occasions.<br />
<br />
So, Which one to buy Invictus Victory or 1 Million Royal? if you like very sweet, spice, vanilla and amber go with 1 Million Royal, if you like less sweet, soft spice, more softer with touch of freshness and more easy to wear vanilla and amber combination go with Invictus Victory.<br />
<br />
Performance is good but not beast like 1 Million Royal</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2272190"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2272190#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2261490" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2261490" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LocalFraghead"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1876058"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LocalFraghead" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72557.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Invictus Platinum"title="Invictus Platinum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2261490ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2261490" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1876058">LocalFraghead</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-26">08/26/24 08:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is probably one of the best if not the best everyday winter/fall fragrance because there is no way you offend anyone.Despite being a vanilla fragrance remains fresh in a way and doesnt get cloying,so its a really good option using instead of a blue fragrance during cold weather! It has really nice quality but its not anything groundbreaking. All in all a safe vanilla scent you can blind reach in the colder months!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2261490"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2261490#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2230531" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2230531" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EpicFragrances"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1678076"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="EpicFragrances" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2230531ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2230531" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1678076">EpicFragrances</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 20:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I went to Sephora to smell this and the first thing I thought of was axe dark temptation, This smells like dark temptation but in a really good way. It's a chocolate vanilla scent on my skin with great performance. Perfect for those colder months, works great for school, work or going to the club. <br />
<br />
Smell: 8/10<br />
Longevity: 9 hours<br />
Projection: Medium to Strong<br />
Price: $70-$75 for 100ml at discounters</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2230531"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2230531#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2228583" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I didn't necessarily think that makes it bad though. Very manly would make a good present or blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2194663"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2194663#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2193418" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2193418" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="abadomen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2164168"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2164168.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="abadomen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Acqua-di-Parma-Blu-Mediterraneo-Mandorlo-di-Sicilia-1688.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1688.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Parma Blu Mediterraneo - Mandorlo di Sicilia"title="Acqua di Parma Blu Mediterraneo - Mandorlo di Sicilia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2193418ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2193418" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2164168">abadomen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-19">06/19/24 15:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is an underdog compared to the Elixir, it's just so delicious. The opening is pleasant, except for that random lemony accent that slightly threw me off for 5 seconds. But that damned dry down. The dry down smells like sitting with the guys as the last calls of the bar, away from the hustle and bustle. You're feeling snug from the buzz, and the overnight pastry chefs across the street are venting out their place. It has the warmth of vanilla and amber with just a hint of spice. When comparing this to Mercedes Club Black, this frag is fairly similar but without the incense smokiness/darkness. Overall inoffensive, this frag is a safe blind buy if you are acquainted with a smell close to that of Axe Dark Temptations.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2193418"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2193418#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2188667" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2188667" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Turbojet4458"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2095521"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2095521.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Turbojet4458" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Haramain-Perfumes/Detour-Noir-70748.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70748.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dtour Noir"title="Dtour Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2188667ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2188667" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2095521">Turbojet4458</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-14">06/14/24 20:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Me and my siblings got this for Dad on Father's Day 2021, a few months after it came out. Just to try it. Despite all of us going blind on this it turned out to be such a good fragrance. Whenever I see this specific black bottle and smell the juice nowadays. I just want to go back to that time where it was just online classes, online classes, online classes... Oh, and going out for walks with some sprays with my dad's permission. And then going back to the puny, god-damned Diavolo I kept on wearing when the bottle ran out. Big bummer.<br />
<br />
Unasked life stuff aside, this smells awesome. Like a warm hug. For some reason, I can only remember the amber and vanilla from all those notes. To me, it was only that. And I loved every spray and second I wore it. Strong, manly, perfect for a cold day. Lasted a long time on me and my clothes. <br />
<br />
Fast forward three years later. Smelt this at the mall last week because I wanted to and yep, 2021 in a bottle personally. And I still feel just the amber and vanilla. I don't even want Victory Elixir. This is perfection to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2188667"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2188667#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2185041" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2185041" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sidalwayssmellsgood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2001234"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2001234.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sidalwayssmellsgood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2185041ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2185041" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2001234">sidalwayssmellsgood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-11">06/11/24 11:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>No wood listed. But it still smells woody. And the Axe comparison is not an exaggeration.<br />
<br />
Playful, floral, powdery: imagine youre building a treehouse for your kid. It rained the night before, so you can smell the soil, but the wood youre using is freshly cut and you can smell that spicy aroma too. All of this takes a backseat though, because you can smell the bubblegum your kid is chewing while watching you work.<br />
<br />
Inoffensive. Simply spray it on and forget about it. Smells kinda unique thanks to the spiciness. 4-5 hours, no problem.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2185041"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2185041#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2178544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2178544" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Docobe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152384"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2152384.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Docobe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Eau-de-Parfum-25967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2178544ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2178544" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152384">Docobe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 04:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This starts with a powdery lavender like opening that smells exactly like two Labradors in a laundry that likely isn't a lovely space to place two long and large dogs that just want to lick every object lying around. Drying down to a drawing room where two older women discuss the direct differences between dominoes and mahjong and why they prefer games with cards than those with tactile tokens. Wear this if your idea of a good night out is putting on a tuxedo and dressing to the nines only to find out that your booking for the musical you got excited to go see was for the following weekend, meaning that as you are saving for a house it's time to wear your best outfit to have 20 McNuggets with sweet and sour sauce under full moonlight. If you would prefer to open a package filled with bags of air instead of packing peanuts, this one is for you. 7/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2178544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2178544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2175327" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2175327" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="adJayScent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1985107"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1985107.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="adJayScent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Scandal-Pour-Homme-Le-Parfum-74915.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74915.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Scandal Pour Homme Le Parfum"title="Scandal Pour Homme Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2175327ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2175327" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1985107">adJayScent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-02">06/02/24 02:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Literally and I mean literally, this is lynx/axe gold temptation in an Invictus bottle. Scrolling down to write a review I saw that it reminds everyone of it. Did not surprise me. Is it a bad thing though. No. At least its easy to compare it to something</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2175327"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2175327#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2168801" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2168801" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sinkagu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1945767"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1945767.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sinkagu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2168801ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2168801" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1945767">Sinkagu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-26">05/26/24 19:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this because on fragrantica a lot of people seemed to think it smelled very similar to Axe Dark Temptations . I was a bit disappointed when I first sprayed this the opening smelled nothing like DT. But in the dry down is where they are similar. I did a blind smell test with family and they all thought DT smelled better but it was only barely better. The same results for me. Its a more darker and mature Dark Temptation. Since it last longer and is stronger it justifies my purchase. DT and Invictus Victory are only 80% similar MAX. But luckily they are similar enough.<br />
<br />
Price 8/10<br />
Smell 7/10<br />
Longevity 8/10<br />
Projection 8/10 <br />
Overall 7.75/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2168801"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2168801#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165705" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; One of my fav</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2165705"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2165705#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2160336" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2160336" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lhomme_Juanco"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1680123"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1680123.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lhomme_Juanco" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2160336ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2160336" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1680123">Lhomme_Juanco</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 15:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Good as hell not gonna lie. Smells very watery sweet with some slight freshness thanks to the lavender. Very nice and somewhat subtle. Go heavy on the sprays if you want because it wont offend anyone. Very pleasant stuff. Although the Elixir is more my speed, this is still solid.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2160336"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2160336#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2156569" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2156569" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FredericoFurtado"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2132414"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2132414.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FredericoFurtado" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Profondo-59532.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59532.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Gi Profondo"title="Acqua di Gi Profondo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2156569ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2156569" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2132414">FredericoFurtado</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-15">05/15/24 06:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great perfume for a night out in autumn or winter. With a sweet vanilla scent and good projection.<br />
It should not be used in the heat of summer, as it becomes very strong and cloying, at least for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2156569"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2156569#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2150745" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2150745" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JusttheFactsMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JusttheFactsMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bois-1920/Itruk-32129.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32129.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Itruk"title="Itruk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2150745ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2150745" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487">JusttheFactsMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-09">05/09/24 12:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>#670 in my "Tour de Fragrance"<br />
<br />
Of all the Invictus line this is the best, so if I had it to do over I would just get this and not bother with the rest. Nice freshie I use for summer wear. I also have the Maison Alhambra clones Victorioso Nero and Victory, which are the same products with different names. Doesn't seem much different from original to me and the clones are under $25. But between this bottle of the original and the two bottles of Alhambra I'll likely die of old age before I run out, so probably a moot point for me, but save yourself a few bucks.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2150745"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2150745#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2147740" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2147375" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dimsa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2123222"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2123222.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dimsa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2147375ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2147375" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2123222">dimsa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-06">05/06/24 08:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have had this fragrance for quite some time now and I love it. I wear it on my nights out. It's a beautiful fragrance. It's citrusy in the opening then the vanilla and the amber kick in. Quite a sexy, powdery fragrance that lasts 6h+ with high to moderate sillage and It's a compliment puller. The longevity is 6h+ and the sillage is high to moderate. The price is good for a 100ml bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2147375"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2147375#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2143088" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is good? Sure it is.. good for newcomers who gonna buy his first fragrance. This is kinda versatile fragrance easy to wear since it's not too sweet at all but not sport/gym activities. On me performance are moderate, so i'am not gonna buy it for full bottle, if i had to wore this i'm not gonna refuse but yes there is better option than this. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2135214" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="3ak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740934"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1740934.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="3ak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2135214ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2135214" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740934">3ak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-24">04/24/24 13:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Surprisingly good. Nothing special and yes smells like everything else but it's not bad. Smells like it could have been put out by any brand. Doesn't really smell like Invictus though. Only in the opening do I get that classic Invictus bubblegum vibe along with a slight spicy touch from the pepper. That's short lived and then I get the vanilla, tonka and amber. Hint of lavender. Tbh there's something chocolately in here. Slight gourmand cake like tendency. I suppose Victory is the proper name since it's probably my favorite Invictus so far. Haven't tried the Elixir.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2135214"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2135214#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128894" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If you're looking for something similar to that with better performance and projection, this may be perfect for you. Personally, I am not a fan.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2128894"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2128894#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128637" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2123211" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Deswizard"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1274132.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Deswizard" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Emporio-Armani-Stronger-With-You-Amber-79699.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79699.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Amber"title="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Amber"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2123211ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2123211" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274132">Deswizard</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-13">04/13/24 00:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Take the harsh note of balsamic out of Pure XS that made me hate it so much and you're left with this perfection. This opens up with a beautiful blend of vanilla and spice that envelops you in a cocoon of sexy deliciousness. The dry down leaves you with a haze of vanilla and Tonka that never manages to cause nose fatigue.<br />
<br />
You will get compliments on this. It's perfect for date night because no matter who you're with, this fragrance will keep drawing them closer and closer to you. Projection is moderate, sillage is longer than the projection, and this lasts and lasts and lasts. This can work with any age group, and though it is manly, women can easily pull it off.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2123211"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2123211#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2120137" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
