When it comes to smell it smell like vanilla and tonka perfect for date nights or winter times 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2120137"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2120137#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2114738" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2114738" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bigreddal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2078175"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bigreddal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2114738ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2114738" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); Great for date nights! Starts off sweet and spicy. Strong vanilla and pepper, with some nice lemon and lavender in the background. Dries down to vanilla and tonka. 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2114738"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2114738#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2114031" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1276861">Milestone87</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-04">04/04/24 08:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have no idea, why this Fragrance is so hyped? This is one of the most boring Fragrances i have ever smelled. I like Tonka Fragrances, but this Fragrance smells to me kinda not pleasurable, i think the pink pepper and tonka dont work well here, i dont know if its because its not blened well, no idea. This Fragrance tries to be spicy and sweet, but the spiciness is kinda too much here and the sweetness too low. I would never recommend people buying this, go for the Victory Elixir, which is the improved version of this.   There is no category where i can put this Fragrance. Even Vanilla is listed here, but i dont really get the Vanilla i get Tonka but not in a sexy way, like i get it in the Armani Code line.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2110567" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aisoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1554427"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1554427.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aisoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2110567ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2110567" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1554427">aisoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 05:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great winter fragrance from the Invictus line.<br />
<br />
Obviously the top 3 here are vanilla, amber and tonka bean, some olibanum and pink pepper. Very sweet and smooth, warm and a little spicy. Some may refer it to a little chocolatey.<br />
<br />
Also, great performance. 1-2 spray and it will do the job. Long lasting. Very good for date nights. Shines in the cold weather.<br />
<br />
Would recommend a try </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2110567"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2110567#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2109268" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I really do recommend and its a safe blind buy in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2103940"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2103940#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2097057" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2097057" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HugoPL"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868335"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1868335.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HugoPL" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Homme-Ideal-25780.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25780.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LHomme Ideal"title="LHomme Ideal"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2097057ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2097057" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868335">HugoPL</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-19">03/19/24 03:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sinttico si. Pero ese toque de la pimienta y el limn con un toque de vainilla en la salida es espectacular, especial. Sublime. Para ir de antro, fiestas, una cita o salir a la calle en un da o noche fra esto es sublime. No huele a Axe de chocolate como suelen decir. El incienso y la parte dulce del fondo le dan un toque encantador. A m esposa le gust tanto que ella me lo regal y es de mis favoritos para poca de fro :) no tiene nada que ver con invictus clsico o varios de sus flankers. Es totalmente otra cosa. No comprar a ciegas, de verdad hay que probarlo. Cumplidos si los buscas los tendrs y por montones. Si una fragancia se masifica y gusta tanto por algo ser. No te dejes llevar que porque el vecino, el ex, el carnicero, el lechero, el que va a tu lado en el metrobus o en la calle lleve invictus o one million. Si te gusta adelante. Apuesta segura en perfumes dulces para la fiesta y ocasiones informales. Evita esto con mucho calor o en una oficina aunque el aire acondicionado est a todo lo que da. Puede resultar empalagoso y molesto para muchos. Para m si es un 10/10. Opinin de un aficionado a los perfumes con una coleccin pequea realmente pero si he conocido a muchos que les encanta este Victory tanto como a m.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Some days I smell vanilla &amp; chocolate, some days I smell vanilla &amp; cedar, and some days it's like I ate good ol' Mexican food, had a horrible sh*t, and didn't wash my hands after wiping. <br />
<br />
The same toilet phenomenon also applies to the Victorioso Victory/Nero Dupe: 10/10 experience, would buy again</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2081647"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2081647#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2081039" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Vanilla fragrance and compliment getter mostly in the cold days of the year and for me only in the night. Not recommended blind buy test this one out.<br />
<br />

Longevity 6/10<br />
Versatility 7/10 <br />
Bottle design 8/10<br />
Price 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2081039"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2081039#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2079433" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I as a woman am obsessed with the black to dark blue bottle, Invictus Victory Elixir I believe the name is. I dont think Id like this flanker better but Id probably love it enough to keep it for me and/or my dude to use. I like the sound of all the reviews.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2056826"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2056826#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2056122" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2056122" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rin__iris"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995780"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="rin__iris" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2056122ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2056122" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995780">rin__iris</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-08">02/08/24 09:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is truly eternal. The lasting power is incredible, the fragrance is timeless, and the overall vibe is unique. Anyone who uses this fragrance is sure to stand out in a crowd. <br />
<br />
Now, for the lasting power on objects: Someone that I cherish wears this scent, and when they had to move away, they sprayed some on an article of clothing and left it for me. The scent developed beautifully and lasted for several weeks. While it smells stronger in enclosed spaces, it will last to at least some degree if sprayed on an object left in an open room. In enclosed spaces, it will last for weeks. I sprayed some on a test strip when I came across a bottle at the shops and kept it on the dashboard of my car. The scent filled the space and has yet to dissipate completely. <br />
<br />
The projection on the skin is, as one would expect, enormous. I am certainly able to pick out this scent from over 2 meters away, and a person who has freshly spritzed their skin will fill a room and leave a decent trail when they walk away. <br />
<br />
Nothing will be able to replace this fragrance as my favorite in the masculine category.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2056122"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2056122#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2046025" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2046025" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="imKingRami"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1943234"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1943234.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="imKingRami" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/CK-One-Shock-For-Him-12520.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12520.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="CK One Shock For Him"title="CK One Shock For Him"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2046025ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2046025" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1943234">imKingRami</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-29">01/29/24 15:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a great fragrance. Smells great, projection is somewhat average but the longevity is crazy. I get around 12+ hours maybe even more depending on the amount of sprays you use. Id give it a 9/10 only because of the projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2046025"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2046025#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2037164" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2037164" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PeopleTent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208922"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1208922.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PeopleTent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2037164ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2037164" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208922">PeopleTent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-21">01/21/24 01:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice masculine vanilla cake fragrance for cold weather.  It starts off with a semi bright lemon on top opening making it daytime wearable worthy then transitions to mostly vanilla gourmandy for the rest of the day and night and into the next day.  Love the performance. A little on the muture side maybe because of the spices but that's a good thing because it sets itself apart from smelling like the ultra popular Lemale vanillaness.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2037164"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2037164#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2036794" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2027835" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ParfumGatekeeper"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1969077"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1969077.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ParfumGatekeeper" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zoologist-Perfumes/Seahorse-69386.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69386.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Seahorse"title="Seahorse"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2027835ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2027835" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1969077">ParfumGatekeeper</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-11">01/11/24 11:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This Scent is without a doubt a great buy, it has a great amount of masculines to it unlike the elixir which is slightly to sweet for some. but on top of that after the initial top note it becomes a very smooth spicy and sweet scent. the longevity is quite nice I apply it at 7 in the morning and 9 hours later after swimming in a pool from 2-4 I still catch hints of it. the only thing is the projection is just slightly above average, I'd say if you're willing to spend 50 more dollars buy 1 mil elixir which is somewhat similar to victory but its strength and projection trumps it. I'd also say the atomizer is great but very weak in dispersing the scent definitely deserves a couple more sprays.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2027835"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2027835#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2026733" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2026206" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tsyen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1752994"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1752994.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tsyen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2026206ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2026206" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1752994">tsyen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-10">01/10/24 00:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Overall like this fragrance, theres something different about the vanilla note compared to other fragrances. The opening was ok (could be a bit harsh at times, will let it macerate), mid was fantastic, and I find the dry down becomes a bit too bubble-gummy for me, but it is the hallmark of invictus OG. This fragrance didnt last too long on my skin, and silage was average, which is perfectly fine for me. I prefer a fragrance to be discovered, not announced.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2026206"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2026206#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2020346" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Lasts very long on my skin, around 10 hours including shower. Pulls compliments and smells very classy yet not too formal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="2020346"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=2020346#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2014097" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I have both, Pure XS has lasted me like 2 years, it has something cloying about it, although I like it, I don't reach for it often. But Invictus Victory is quite diffrent. It's so sweet and warm. Quite dark and masculine scent, i really enjoy it, got many compliments as well, nothing groundbreaking or special though, do not expect a unique style Victory Elixir is a little bit more unique and appealing i would say. Either way, both of them are great for me, but i think it's redundant to buy Victory Elixir when you already have Victory.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1994802"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1994802#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994240" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1910302">Invictus_ot</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-29">11/29/23 20:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i may be a bit bias but let me just say i love this stuff i will admit when you first put it on its a little harsh but after an hour or so it cools down and becomes a fresh, sexy, and clean smelling fragrance that can be worn casually or to occasions and i think its one of the best buys i have ever made, new daily and will perma be part of my collection no matter how big it gets.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1988599"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1988599#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1984638" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1984638" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blake.lee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/996171"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.996171.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="blake.lee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/SP-Parfums-Sven-Pritzkoleit/Suntanglam-43301.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43301.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Suntanglam"title="Suntanglam"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1984638ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1984638" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/996171">blake.lee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-24">11/24/23 23:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smelled this on a man today and it was delicious. I asked what he was wearing and he said Invictus. I shook my head and said No, not the original. He laughed and replied You know your colognes. The one in the black bottle. He told me it wasnt his favorite cologne. I told him this was understandable but it was a perfect choice for the holiday event we were attending. He agreed and said he was going to wear it more with this in mind.<br />
<br />
The scent is Christmas in a cozy, sexy way. No, its not very original but its very appealing. Vanilla, amber, nutty, chocolatey, sweet. It does smell like a more expensive Axe Dark Temptation. Easy reach for the Holiday season. Checks most of my boxes for the formulas I prefer on men.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1984638"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1984638#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1984420" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1968945" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Afrikano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1290419.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Afrikano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1968945ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1968945" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290419">Afrikano</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-05">11/05/23 00:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tested this in the mall but I couldnt get a good feel for it so I bought a 15ml travel atomizer for about $20 just to test it, and I think this is all Ill ever need of this scent. Sure enough its a amber vanilla scentbut something about this makes it the worst one Ive tried yet. It comes off almost musty to me, like a old dusty type of vanilla youd get from someone trying to mask the smell of their old house with a candle. The dry down surprisingly gets worse too to the point where my nose gets tired of smelling it. Just a very powdery/cakey, musty type of vanilla scent that I dont see myself wearing. A better alternative to this would be Pure XS Night or for a Vanilla/Amber alternative, MB Club Black. I doubt Ill finish my atomizer of this and will most likely gift it to someone else.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1968945"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1968945#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1967325" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1967325" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brender"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1869984"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1869984.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brender" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1967325ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1967325" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1869984">Brender</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-02">11/02/23 22:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has a classic vanilla scent. And combined with the rest of the notes all I can say is that it's smells like vanilla cake. Unlike other vanilla fragrances these combine like vanilla and sugar into a powdery cake scent. The straight-forwardness of it is what makes me love it, which also makes it a perfect every day and signature scent.<br />
For me the performance is average (still good) but it's cool that it works so well for other people.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1967325"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1967325#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1954287" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570718">YannisPapadopoulos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-13">10/13/23 11:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For the longest time I hadn't heard a single reviewer mention Dark Temptation from AXE. The first moment I applied this on skin, I had this strong feeling "where do I know this from?" until it hit me. This is quite identical to Dark Temptation, just a tiny bit thicker. I was glad that in the "smells like" section the AXE was first up. I was sure I'd be the crazy one that comes up with it, but my relief was immense If you like that type of DNA, go for it. It lasts and lingers for 6-8hrs.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1951021"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1951021#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1950440" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1950440" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mkpunk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001800"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mkpunk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Dua-Brand/Gone-Swimming-in-Electrique-85505.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85505.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gone Swimming in lectrique"title="Gone Swimming in lectrique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1950440ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1950440" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001800">mkpunk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-12">10/12/23 18:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Paco Rabanne Invictus Victory, I didn't think much of this for the longest time. I already had Invictus Intense. Invictus Intense for those that don't know is Invictus but with whiskey added in. Invictus Victory has much more going on and smells like a black sheep of the Invictus family. Many liked it so I wonder if I would because with oblanium, I am hit and miss on. Then I got a vial of it with a Macy's purchase.<br />
<br />
Paco Rabanne Invictus Victory is a problem. What I mean by that is it a really good fragrance. I wouldn't quite call it a love because it really is an entirely foreign take on Invictus and really has minimal similarity besides it being in the trophy flacon. It opens with a slightly pink pepper/lemon open. Now Invictus and most flankers is a grapefruit/sea water/salt open with some bay leaf. This has none of that whatsoever. Victory then goes a little bit smokey with lavender and olibanum. It is good to wear to a concert as the smoky olibanum does give off tobacco/pot vibes. I had to remember at times that I did NOT smoke. The base is a mix of vanilla and a slightly chocolatey tonka amber mix. Olibanum is the strongest note in Victory.<br />
<br />
To describe Invictus Victory is a bit weird. On the one hand, it is a cousin to Invictus fragrances. You can tell it is related and not by bottle. That said it goes into a similar direction to Acqua Di Gio Profumo with the smoky semi aquatic vibe. <br />
<br />
Invictus Victory I cannot really comment on performance unless I get a real bottle, which I may considering how much I enjoy it. That said, with knowing that Maison Alhambra has a clone Victoroso Victory, I think the likelihood is lower. That said the vial can make a decent cloud. It is masculine leaning if not outright masculine. I can see it working in fall or winter, maybe spring in most climates, but not Arizona as our Spring heats up during the day. This will NOT be a good heat fragrance while other Invictus flankers are more in line of being good in higher heat situations. <br />
<br />
I do think this is overpriced because unless I can find it dirt cheap (which many Invictus flankers have ended up as in time while Victory hasn't,) I do not think it is worth it. Now that doesn't mean I don't like Victory, but at its pricing, I think it is a pass given my financial situation. Good thing Maison Alhambra has their clone.<br />
<br />
In all Invictus Victory gets a 7.5 out of 10 from me. When the Maison Alhambra clone is added, I'll review that too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1950440"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1950440#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1949421" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1949421" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shahzadhk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1862099"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="shahzadhk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1949421ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1949421" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1862099">shahzadhk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-11">10/11/23 12:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>10/10 Fragrance. It is a beautifully made gourmand. Opens with a zingy red pepper mixed with the tonka and vanilla. Has a warm spicy and chocolatey feel with a bit of pepper mixed in. Good for most settings in the winter time, especially dates. Sillage could be better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1949421"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1949421#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1945828" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1930958" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cowboy87"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1833290"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cowboy87" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1930958ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1930958" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); I get vanilla and chocolate the most. As it dries I get amber. I like this scent but don't love it. Price is good on discounters. Longevity and projection are good for the price and being designer. 7 out of 10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1930958"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1930958#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1920783" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The freshness from the lemon and lavender definitely lifts this up to be used on a late summer night.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1920400"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1920400#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1920295" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1920295" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DorianBovier03"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1781501"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1781501.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DorianBovier03" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Versace-Pour-Homme-Dylan-Blue-40031.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40031.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue"title="Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1920295ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1920295" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1781501">DorianBovier03</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-05">09/05/23 09:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like every modern vanilla fragrance if they had been stripped of what makes them interesting. Just vanilla tonka sweetness and thats it. Doesnt smell bad and will certainly get you compliments but its just boring af. Theres plenty of other fragrances with that DNA that are better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1920295"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1920295#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1919624" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374575">Detman101</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-03">09/03/23 10:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Decided to give this another try and picked up another bottle.<br />
COMPLETELY different experience from the first bottle I tried!!!<br />
This one is creamy vanilla with a slight spice and kick somewhere in the background.<br />
VERRRRRRY Nice!!! This will make a GREAT base layer for my Tobacco fragrances and if not, it stands great on its own. Doesn't seem to project very far, but leaves the most amazing scent bubble around me and honestly...that's all that matters. As long as I am in this beautiful scent bubble all day, that's all that matters.<br />
<br />
08DEC23:<br />
I haven't worn this at all since "Bianco Latte" and "Sweetly Known" entered my life.<br />
I may pass this on to my son...Maybe. =p</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1918773"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1918773#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1915867" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; However in the dry down i noticed the amber becomes very prominent and smells super synthetic the more it dries. Its almost too sweet and when smelt close has a rotten or bad smell about it. The sweetness is still evident but you lose the citrusy fresh opening. Overall an 7/10 for me not its a nice frag but i wouldnt buy it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1904596"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1904596#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1900440" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Once it settles it is a very fruity, vanilla heavy a little spicy scent. Smells good but it's nothing unique. And I feel the quality could be little better. Performance average on my skin. Moderate longevity and projection. Not a high heat scent. 10/10 </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1895245"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1895245#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1891048" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1801914">Scroub</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-31">07/31/23 08:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great vanilla scent. Not quite high heat friendly but otherwise very pleasant. 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1891048"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1891048#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1878986" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1878986" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ReekoSuave"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1789410"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ReekoSuave" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1878986ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1878986" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1789410">ReekoSuave</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-14">07/14/23 21:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I smelled this fragrance, I instantly fell in love with it.  It instantly became my signature.  And for those who say this stuff smells like Axe Dark Temptation, it's not even close. This stuff has a very fruity vibe to it and Axe DT is all about smelling like nothing but chocolate and chocolate only.  To confuse the two is utterly ridiculous.  If this stuff smells like anything else, it's much closer to something like Spicebomb Extreme.  Also, I find it a rare breed of the Invictus line in that it foes not smell synthetic at all while all the others do.  I was surprised by that.  Instantly bought another 4oz bottle and then got online and ordered two 200ml bottles.  That should last me maybe one year.  Seriously love this stuff that much.  I'd take a bath in it if I could.  But for now, I'll just have to roll around in it like a dog.  LOL</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1878986"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1878986#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1873090" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1873090" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Omnithis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1783312"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1783312.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Omnithis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1873090ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1873090" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1783312">Omnithis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-06">07/06/23 22:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this scent. It's perfectly sweet, the vanilla is great, and preforms decently long!  When I first got a whiff, I thought "this is it." As a teen there is practically nothing better. I will say that I am not particularly experienced, however I just love this on me better than all my other colognes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1873090"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1873090#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1865269" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1865269" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Psalzarulo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723203"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Psalzarulo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1865269ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1865269" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723203">Psalzarulo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-26">06/26/23 18:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a bold, sweet smell that's done right. The vanilla, lavender, and amber notes combine for an almost honey-like quality. The added Tonka Bean gives it a somewhat dark, chocolaty base. Even though I don't really like the OG Invictus or Invictus Aqua, I really like this scent although I can't see myself actually wearing it as I don't have much of a use for scents this sweet in my daily life. If you do like this, I would suggest checking out Paco Rabanne Phantom for another sweet scent that is more on the fruity side.<br />
<br />
8.5/10 scent for me. This would be very very popular in a club/dance setting but not really suited for anything more formal. I really like the smell but it's just not my style. People saying it's just Axe Dark Temptation should try smelling this on another person to judge it accurately.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1865269"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1865269#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1860124" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1860124" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jose Zerpa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747931"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jose Zerpa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1860124ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1860124" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747931">Jose Zerpa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-19">06/19/23 17:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I should've read the comments in Fragrantica before buying it in a rush as I did. I must admit, this one has a beautiful opening, but it's the dry down that puts me off. It's my fault for not giving it enough time on my skin before making the decision to buy. Back in the day 20 years ago I used to like Dark Temptation Axe, but today this is simply not a good fit for me for me anymore. <br />
if you're in your mid 40s like me, and are looking for a seductive fragrance, I would strongly recommend you to look somewhere else. And if you enjoy the smell of Dark Temptation, I'd rather suggest you to get the original Axe, which smells a lot better than Victory, and for a fraction of the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1860124"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1860124#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1856647" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1525530">stevebayerin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-15">06/15/23 01:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Base notes are closer to Axe Dark Temptation than Armani Code Absolu Homme, Nice lavender note. It may be similar to Pure XS without the ginger, liquor and cola notes.<br />
<br />
Edit:<br />
While I don't get reminded of Code Absolu when I wear Invictus Victory, I get reminded of Invictus VIctory when I wear Code Absolu.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1852962" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="IA2023"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1730955"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="IA2023" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1852962ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1852962" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); Sweet vanilla, but not cloying. Woody, but not like an ashtray. Long lasting on clothes.<br />
<br />
Edit: I got tired of the Tonka bean smell, it would be better without it...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1852962"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1852962#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1850967" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
