I love Armani Code and Tonca Cola so i thought this was going to be something similar - a different smell, but a similar idea, but its not. It smells like a cheap deodorant mixed with sweat and vanilla. Maybe its just me or something is wrong with my batch but this is like 3/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1850967"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1850967#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1847621" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1847621" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GRW0130"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1672937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1672937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GRW0130" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1847621ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1847621" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); Two main notes to me here are Vanilla and Lavender by far with some lemon that doesnt smell too citrusy to me but is there to brighten the scent up a tad. Very good fragrance and very good clubbing scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1847621"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1847621#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1839264" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's very dense &amp; polished. Only suitable for cold weather, during the evening. I can only imagine someone like James Bond wearing this. It's such a smooth fragrance. Currently there's nothing like this in the market. I already bought the OG now I want this one. When you wear this on your skin it becomes leathery, in a very good way. The OG and the Elixir has that Fresh Oceanic feel to it, but not this one. Elixir is a bit playful, as in suitable for a night out, but this one is for serious occasions only.<br />
<br />
Keep in mind, here they've mistakenly mentioned the notes of Invictus Victory Elixir.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1832533"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1832533#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1831821" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Victory is just an amazingly clever blend of vanilla, amber, tonka bean, and some sweetness. Wouldn't recommend to wear this in the summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1822413"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1822413#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1819386" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1707754">Smell_your_best_brian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-27">04/27/23 16:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening for this reminds me of those candy sticks back in the 2000s where they had a superhero in front of the box. It smells like that candy and a bit like marshmallow fluff. I'm attached to this but unfortunately I'll have to wait for winter cause when I'm typing this it is almost summer. I fucking love this!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1819386"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1819386#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1818058" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1818058" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frankcoelho"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712325"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1712325.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frankcoelho" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/L-Immensite-49751.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49751.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LImmensit "title="LImmensit "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1818058ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1818058" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712325">frankcoelho</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-26">04/26/23 09:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wife bought it at full retail in a 200mL (6.8oz) bottle as a gift for my b-day and I gotta confess this was a full on surprise in terms of performance and wearability. I tested it at Macy's not long ago and got some peel off samples. From just that small qty I decided that's the fragrance I wanted.<br />
 Got two wears out of it and decided the 200mL bottle would never end. This is punchy, long lasting, good projector, as well as an intoxicatingly sexy fragrance. Hints of gourmand chocolate and vanilla makes it delicious, particularly in the combination of some citrus in the opening. So I returned it to Macy's and waiting now for it to show up on discounters.<br />
 In contrast with the ELIXIR, this is much more user friendly. You can, however, overspray this, as I found 3-4 sprays to be sufficient for a night out - clubbing may take some 5-6 sprays after getting a nice shower.<br />
 Recommend this to guys in the 30s as well, and the ladies will love you for it. Bring in some playfulness along with a seriously powerful fragrance.<br />
<br />
FEW months later: sold my repurchase to a friend - definitely young audience for this. I could not wear it, though I loved the opening, it dried down to a simplistic, quite synthetic amber-vanilla. Still a good fragrance, as it could very well be my skin, but that opening needed to last/linger a bit more through the body of the fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1818058"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1818058#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1815023" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1815023" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Luxtek"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1679595"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1679595.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Luxtek" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1815023ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1815023" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1679595">Luxtek</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-22">04/22/23 11:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This it's a beautiful powdery chocolatey and vanilla fragance, just like a smooth and quality Dark Temptation. It's beautiful for the dates, it's not super invasive but it's very long lasting. Great fragance for the price, nice smell, long lasting, charming, easy to wear and mass appealing. I just bought a 200ml of this bc it's definitely worth it for the price. If your looking for a super complex and rare scent this is not for you.<br />
<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1815023"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1815023#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1812134" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1812134" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Afc_Croatian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1370156.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Afc_Croatian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Libre-Intense-62318.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62318.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Libre Intense"title="Libre Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1812134ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1812134" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370156">Afc_Croatian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-18">04/18/23 17:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This shit is fucking fantastic, to put it lightly...<br />
<br />
You were probably under the assumption that this would be something similar to the Invictus line, or maybe something that tried to be really dark and deep. You're right on the ladder.<br />
<br />
Invictus Victory opens with that gourmand, edible vanilla and subtle pink pepper that we all know and love. That vanilla just beautiful, Paco Rabane blended this fragrance so well to make it smell incredibly edible.<br />
I keep smelling myself and it smells almost exactly like cookies, or some sort of sweet dessert, god I want to drink this bottle.<br />
<br />
Lasts long, projects greatly, $82 cad for a 50ml isn't bad, a 200ml bottle is only $120!<br />
<br />
9.3/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1812134"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1812134#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1808963" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Sometimes I spray it on my arm when I'm home just to sniff it from time to time. Sometimes it can be a bit overpowering but it's great for winter and clubs. Sometimes I get away with 5+ sprays and sometimes 2 sprays feel like a LOT, it's kind of strange, maybe I just got used to the smell over time. Haven't gotten much compliments tho. Stays on clothes for a couple of days.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1799704"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1799704#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1790128" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492455">Chiquipunky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-15">03/15/23 09:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>No se parece en NADA a ARMANI CODE menos a JPG. Tiene una ligera similitud a PURE XS en la salida pero la vainilla y el ambar comienzan a concentrarse mas con el paso de las horas. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1784056"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1784056#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1781262" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1781262" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Steve907"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1672974"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Steve907" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Code-Profumo-34761.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34761.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Code Profumo"title="Armani Code Profumo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1781262ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1781262" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1672974">Steve907</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-11">03/11/23 17:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The reason why this is called victory is because it's the fragrance equivalent to winning the blue ribbon at the 4H part of the county fair. Absolutely overwhelms my olfactory sense to the point that I can't really differentiate the notes. It ends up smelling like hay. If you want to wear this, I suggest spraying it on someone else and have them follow three feet behind you, or in front of you if you want to walk through the sillage. Did I have a headache before, or do I have a headache now because of this fragrance? Yes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1781262"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1781262#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1776943" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1767830"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1767830#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1766890" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1766890" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SgtButtCheeks"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580700"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1580700.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SgtButtCheeks" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Eau-de-Parfum-25967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1766890ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1766890" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580700">SgtButtCheeks</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-22">02/22/23 19:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Vanilla spice.  Thats what this is.  Starts sweet and the vanilla sticks around all day.  Even in warm south Florida weather. Tons of compliments even from people who typically say they dont like the sweet stuff. <br />
Its my fav Paco Rabanne.   Must have.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1766890"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1766890#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1766886" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1766886" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tacosalad"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545991"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tacosalad" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Issey-Miyake/L-Eau-d-Issey-Pour-Homme-721.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.721.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme"title="L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1766886ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1766886" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545991">Tacosalad</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-22">02/22/23 18:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is really is a designer version of Axe dark temptation body spray or as close as your going to get at least.  Very pleasant scent but thick and somewhat sticky like most PR fragrance. Its almost alittle raunchy with sweetness.  I feel it would be better with slightly less concentration.  Its too much for anything but cold weather and nightlife.  Vanilla is hit and miss with me but this one is sweet vanilla not powdery. Kinda like Code Profumo minus the leather with a touch of Azzaro WBN. Date friendly and attractive to women. Over spray with caution, this will fill a room in a hurry. Lasts 8 hours in winter and projects well the whole time.  Pretty linear from start to finish. I might say its alittle too young for me in my mid 40s.  Would be best for teens and 20s crowd that like dark temptation. Code Profumo is a better over 30 scent with same character and vibe but more mature. 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1766886"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1766886#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1764326" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1764326" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scent of gentleman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1614127"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1614127.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scent of gentleman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ermenegildo-Zegna/Florentine-Iris-16189.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16189.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Florentine Iris"title="Florentine Iris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1764326ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1764326" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1614127">Scent of gentleman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-19">02/19/23 22:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is so good for almost anytime, dress up or dress down, office or date night, but, not for outdoor activity under the hot sunshine, due to it's sweetness. Gourmand deliciousness and sexy aura in one bottle: Invictus Victory!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1764326"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1764326#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1756799" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1756799" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ClaudeDLT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1264067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1264067.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ClaudeDLT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65177.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Invictus Victory"title="Invictus Victory"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1756799ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1756799" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1264067">ClaudeDLT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-10">02/10/23 11:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As I was trying to find a replacement for my Armani code profundo, this one can do the trick. It might not be the same, but it's almost close because the amber, the tonka and the vanilla are the most prominent notes, that last all day long just like profumo.<br />
 Since it's Invictus line, Paco Rabanne delivers what he promises. I really love this one for colder days, has I love the EDP version summer days. It's long lasting and alluring, it doesn't have a bubble gummy vibe, but it does have a gourmand vibe on to it. <br />
 If you like the Invictus line and if you're into the code profumo, you should try this one, it won't let you down </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1756799"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1756799#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1750234" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1750234" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AverageFragrenceEnjoyer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676559"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1676559.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AverageFragrenceEnjoyer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Interlude-Man-15294.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15294.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Interlude Man"title="Interlude Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1750234ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1750234" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676559">AverageFragrenceEnjoyer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-02">02/02/23 19:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me it smells like I dripped vanilla ice cream on my skin, delicious and addictive in winter, although I cant see it working anytime else. IMO it would work for a cozy date watching movies under a thick blanket, and thats about it, not much versatility but a really nice fragrance (in my experience both men and women loved it). In terms of performance I could still smells this on my skin over 15 hours later but that may vary for different people.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1750234"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1750234#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1748224" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1748224" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RICH4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/184270"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="RICH4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65177.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Invictus Victory"title="Invictus Victory"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1748224ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1748224" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); I have both and they are very similar. Longevity is great on clothes and average on skin. Buy it now, and thank me later.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1748224"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1748224#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1747510" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1747510" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="djigoio"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1488846"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1488846.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="djigoio" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Essential-Parfums/Bois-Imperial-64338.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64338.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois Imprial"title="Bois Imprial"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1747510ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1747510" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1488846">djigoio</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-30">01/30/23 12:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Am I the only one picking up a similar vibe to something from Azzaro Wanted line here (by night, Most wanted?)<br />
<br />
It's okay, I get a lot of tonka, pink pepper and Vanilla is really blended, hard for me to notice, but it is there.<br />
<br />
Performance wise seems decent, will fill a room the first hour. Watch the number of sprays</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1747510"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1747510#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1746921" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1746921" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ali_mario"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374191"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1374191.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ali_mario" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1746921ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1746921" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374191">Ali_mario</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-29">01/29/23 17:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The performance is very weak for a fragrance at this price point.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1746921"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1746921#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1744309" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1744309" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="beta-ionone"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1605092"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1605092.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="beta-ionone" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Hypnotic-Poison-219.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.219.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hypnotic Poison"title="Hypnotic Poison"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1744309ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1744309" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1605092">beta-ionone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-26">01/26/23 12:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A good spicy men's fragrance that leans on the sweet side. May be unisex. It smells like mulling spices but has the sweetness of vanilla added. Smells really good and makes a good scent for fall and winter.<br />
<br />
Reminds me of Lolita Lempicka Green Lover but Invictus Victory is more "put together" in its notes where there isn't one completely strong note that stands out. Green Lover dries down to just the sweet vanilla and small hints of pepper and may be a bit too sweet for some men, whereas Invictus Victory does have the sweet vanilla but retains some of the spice on the drydown. Smells good. Lolita Lempicka's Green Lover is way cheaper though. If you love mulled spice scents or 'red' fragrances like Old Spice deodorants or Polo Red, Invictus Victory is a good scent to add to your collection.  It's inoffensive and office safe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1744309"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1744309#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1742849" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1742849" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scentipede78"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1670070"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1670070.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scentipede78" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1742849ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1742849" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1670070">Scentipede78</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-25">01/25/23 04:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The OG Invictus was my first purchase as a collector, now that my nose has matured it knocks me sick, Invictus Victory however is simply beautiful. I get the Armani Code comparisons, it's sophisticated, it's inviting, it's warm and very smooth. I tried it on my hand recently and couldn't stop giving it a sniff the whole day, and yes! it lasted the whole day from 2 sprays. It smells NOTHING like Invictus, this flanker deserves that trophy bottle so much more. Quality!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1742849"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1742849#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1734822" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1734822" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PHBLUE"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1632443"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1632443.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PHBLUE" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mercedes-Benz/Mercedes-Benz-Club-Black-46797.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46797.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mercedes Benz Club Black"title="Mercedes Benz Club Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1734822ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1734822" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1632443">PHBLUE</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-15">01/15/23 13:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love this juice. Sure, has some resemblance to Pure XS (not a bad thing, IMHO) with its dry cola vibe. However, IV has more sweetness that adds a bit more body to this frag compared to Pure XS. I like them both, I think there's room for both. Neither is too expensive (though both are out of cheapie range.) <br />
<br />
Opens fruity and peppery, more so than Pure XS. Resinous Olibanum starts to pop out in the mid, a little white noise to some noses but I happen to enjoy that. Dries down sweet, no surprise given its base notes. <br />
<br />
A great pick up, especially if you can find a good price. Recently picked up a 200ml for ~$88.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1734822"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1734822#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1734199" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1734199" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RandyHolbert"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1411655"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1411655.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RandyHolbert" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/CH-Pasion-for-Him-78641.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78641.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="CH Pasin for Him"title="CH Pasin for Him"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1734199ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1734199" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1411655">RandyHolbert</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-14">01/14/23 18:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>a great find. got a couple mates who like this, recommending this for anyone looking for a boozy vanilla type of perfume. the citrus and pepper accord balances the vanilla really well. long-lasting, well worth the hype.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1734199"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1734199#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1729936" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1729936" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hc123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657388"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1657388.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hc123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Eau-Sauvage-231.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.231.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Sauvage"title="Eau Sauvage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1729936ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1729936" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657388">hc123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-09">01/09/23 23:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Looking for a lighter winter scent for casual nights and found this. It starts with a lemon and almost a Armani code DNA mixed with coca cola vibes. As soon as it starts drying the vanilla shows up and it's almost on the verge of turning this into a vanilla bomb. Vanilla with a hint of lemon and spice is what I smell for the majority of the wear. Having said that I do enjoy wearing this and have gotten compliments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1729936"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1729936#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1729069" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
