<br />
10 / 10 that's it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1729069"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1729069#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1722535" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1722535" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ISmellTooGood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1495312"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ISmellTooGood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Eau-de-Parfum-71606.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71606.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Gi Eau de Parfum"title="Acqua di Gi Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1722535ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1722535" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1495312">ISmellTooGood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-01">01/01/23 12:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Upon first spraying, this fragrance will automatically give you a warm and fuzzy feeling, followed by a feeling of familiarity... OH WAIT, that feeling of familiarity is because Paco Rabanne already has a scent ALMOST EXACTLY LIKE THIS. It's called Pure XS, and boy oh boy does Victory smell like it. Good thing I'm already almost out of Pure XS, and good thing I wanted more. Instead of myrrh, it's frankincense. Instead of bergamot, it's lemon. The combination of lavender and the other sweeter elements of vanilla, tonka bean and amber give it that herbal and effervescent smell. Pink pepper rounds it off with the same spiced vibe you get with Pure XS. This is just a newer version of a scent Paco Rabanne has had for years. Don't get me wrong, it's really good, but original? Not at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1722535"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1722535#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1713199" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1713199" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Applejuice1025"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1527506"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1527506.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Applejuice1025" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1713199ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1713199" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1527506">Applejuice1025</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-19">12/19/22 23:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I fell in love with Azzaro The Most Wanted Parfum and JPG Le Male Le Parfum and I figured I was set for my fall / winter fragrancesthen I received Invictus Victory as a Birthday gift and I wondered how the heck I didnt discover this on my own. With the vanilla and the tonka bean I can  understand the comparison to Armani Code but honestly I think this is SO much better. A lot of people are complaining that its nothing like the original Invictus and theyre right, its not. Original Invictus was great in its heyday but this flanker is in a class all its own and shouldnt even be considered an Invictus flanker. Dont get me wrong, I still love TMW Parfum and Le Male Le Parfum but this one is definitely on the same level and if these were the only three I had to choose from for the current season I would be okay with that. Amazing scent, exceptional longevity, and unique enough to not smell like everyone else. 10 out of 10 for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1713199"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1713199#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1712207" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1712207" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GodKing"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/938128"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.938128.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GodKing" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maxim-s-de-Paris/Maxim-s-pour-Homme-11066.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11066.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Maxim's pour Homme"title="Maxim's pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1712207ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1712207" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/938128">GodKing</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-18">12/18/22 16:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Victory?  It's the agony of Defeat!  <br />
 <br />
I was bitterly disappointed with this offering from Paco Rabanne.  Although not my most favorite scent genre, there's certainly a time and place for these more youthful, people-pleasing type scents and I actually like Invictus (except for the bottle) and love Aqua Invictus (original 2016 offering).  Sadly, this one shares almost zero similarity with the Invictus lineup, was cavity inducing sweet, and has absolutely no character.  I found it to be sickly-sweet and not enjoyable to wear at all.  The only thing going for this fragrance is that it lasts an honest 6-8 hours on my skin, and pushed-out pretty well the first hour or two.  <br />
 <br />
My "thoughts" the entire time I wore Invictus Defeat (the opposite of Victory) was this scent profile (i.e., sweet, vanilla, tonka, designer baloney-caloney DNA) has been done a hundred times before.  I also remember thinking how I would reach gladly reach for something like Armani Code Ultimate or Absolu if I were in the mood to wear this kind of scent.  Some get it right, like the aforementioned, while others...well, they just don't.  It's a pass for me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1712207"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1712207#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1709271" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1709271" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Assyria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1465705"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1465705.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Assyria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1709271ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1709271" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1465705">Assyria</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-14">12/14/22 12:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got to smell it on my skin and the first impression was it has a sweet and smooth vanilla. Good for intimate moments because you will smell like a vanilla pudding or vanilla ice cream. Overall a nice gourmet scent really like it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1709271"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1709271#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1707286" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1707286" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alvinzm"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1134731"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1134731.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alvinzm" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Crivelli/Oud-Maracuja-83842.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83842.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Maracuj"title="Oud Maracuj"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1707286ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1707286" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1134731">alvinzm</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-11">12/11/22 17:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is like a higher quality version of Axe's Dark Temptation (that I used to love, before entering the world of real fragrances lol).<br />
<br />
It is probably one of the best, if not the best in the Invictus line. Sweet, warm, slightly spicy, woody... it has a very prominent vanilla, tonka bean, and amber combo.<br />
<br />
I think it has grown on me so much since I first tried it. I'm considering to get this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1707286"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1707286#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1702550" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1702550" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Funky_Monk1988"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1591954"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1591954.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Funky_Monk1988" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1702550ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1702550" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1591954">Funky_Monk1988</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-05">12/05/22 07:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Currently my go-to vanille scent, since citrus don't always sit well on my skin (for example the grapefruit in This Is Him, and the mandarin in Armani Code Absolu). If you like more zingy stuff in the opening, you might find it a bit boring. But for me this one is well blended (not overly sweet), and has good longevity. Might be my favorite from the Invictus Line.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1702550"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1702550#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1697473" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1697473" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hamdii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504749"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1504749.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hamdii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-Parfum-73664.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73664.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Most Wanted Parfum"title="The Most Wanted Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1697473ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1697473" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504749">Hamdii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-27">11/27/22 20:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First off. The atomizer on my bottle is horrible, it sprays really far and much comes out but its just too narrow and creates puddles of fragrance anywhere you spray it. <br />
<br />
This is just Vanilla with Citrus. I have a tester of Phantom at home and they smell very similar to me. Victory is just darker and vanilla prominent while Phantom is more citrus prominent and less sweet. Its nice but nothing special.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1697473"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1697473#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1697212" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is very unique. First time I smelled it I did get a slight reminder of Pure XS, but went away quick and I don't even like Pure XS, so it's a good thing. You might find this cloyingly sweet, though, but it's good. Such a nice amber with a coca-cola ish sparkle on top.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1697212"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1697212#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1692413" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1692413" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mr Wishy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1611331"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mr Wishy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Elixir-81642.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81642.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Elixir"title="Le Male Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1692413ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1692413" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1611331">Mr Wishy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-20">11/20/22 07:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>(MY OPINION)<br />
very good vanilla scent. if you like strong vanilla, this is a must-try. there's an overload of vanilla in this with a lavender top note. has some gourmand smell too it, kinda reminds me of a subway cookie. this is NOT masculine. smells young and playful. only people under 25 should use this. my longest lasting fragrance in my collection. amazing sillage. 1 spray on the shirt can last 3 days. quite affordable too. highly recommend this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1692413"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1692413#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1689687" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1689687" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="awinder"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1458949"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="awinder" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1689687ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1689687" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1689687"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1689687#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1687836" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1687836" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="btd069"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341525"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341525.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="btd069" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/French-Riviera-74636.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74636.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="French Riviera"title="French Riviera"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1687836ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1687836" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341525">btd069</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-13">11/13/22 20:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm not a fan of Invictus fragrances typically.  This fragrance is darker, richer and not a bubble gum fragrance.  Sweet Lavander, Vanilla, Tonka, Amber....Pepper is prominent in the opening.  There is a very light citrus up front, but its overtaken by the Oriental &amp; Amber Notes.  It's sweet but in a more vanillic/amber way.  It's the mature man's choice from the  Invictus Line.  Hopefully, they don't discontinue this.  I need to pick up a backup bottle.<br />
<br />
Longevity is slightly above average, but not by much.  I typically get 5-7 hours.......Sillage and Projection is only good for about an hour or two.  Presentation is the typical for the line but black.  Really glad to have this in my collection.  Safe blind buy worthy as long as you don't pay retail and as long as you like warmer notes.  Nothing to not like about fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1687836"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1687836#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1686398" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1686398" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dantek121"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580375"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1580375.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dantek121" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1686398ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1686398" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580375">dantek121</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-11">11/11/22 17:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>While this is an Invictus, I don't get that DNA with this flanker. It smells more so like a premium, higher quality Axe Dark Temptation. That is not a shot to this fragrance at all because lets face it, Axe Dark Temptation is a good scent for what it is. In fact if I had a chance to spray Dior Sauvage or the original Armani Code and Axe Dark Temptation on my wrist together I think it would smell something like this. Either way, it smells good and is one of my main go-to blind reach scents for the season and likely in the upcoming winter. Performance is quite good as well. If you are under 35 I would say you can't go wrong with this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1686398"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1686398#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1683462" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1683462" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="guigsy1986"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589054"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1589054.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="guigsy1986" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1683462ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1683462" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589054">guigsy1986</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-07">11/07/22 23:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells nothing like absolu or profumo like people say. It does smell like lynx/axe dark temptation though. It's a pretty safe fragrance. Projection is very moderate but performance is superb. Sillage is good also considering it don't project off the skin like some powerhouse fragrances. All in all it's not bad.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1683462"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1683462#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1679710" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1679710" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Quiquefs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1454921"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Quiquefs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1679710ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1679710" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1454921">Quiquefs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-02">11/02/22 20:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Considero que es un buen perfume y que le gustar a la mayora, pero en mi caso termin regalando la botella. La razn es que no disfrutaba al llevarlo puesto. La salida es potente y muy sinttica, el que sea un olor sintetico no es del todo malo, pero si me llego a molestar un poco, y esta potencia y buena proyeccin dura poco (2 horas), despues pierde mucha fuerza y queda a ras de piel. El secado es dbil pero dura muchas horas, incluso das en ropa. En el secado el aroma mejora mucho. Sale a relucir una vainilla ahumada con tonka que dan una sensacin achocolatada (nada natural pero huele bien). Quiero aclarar que si es una fragancia que ayuda a conseguir cumplidos. Lo utilice algunas veces en calor y me gener dolor de cabeza y nauseas, por lo que solo recomendara su uso en fro. Personalmente no disfruto los aromas que tienen esa sensacin sinttica tan incisiva. Y en este caso tambin vara muy rpido su potencia o fuerza. Cuando te lo aplicas es super fuerte pero cuando seca baja muy rpido a ras de piel. si considero que es buena, y si recib muchos cumplidos, pero no es para todos. Es un olor que te impresiona al olerlo en el primer instante en el que lo sientes, pero no lo quieres estar oliendo por mucho tiempo. En fin, si yo lo no disfruto no lo uso. Esa fue la razn para regalarlo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1679710"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1679710#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1654905" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1654905" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FFEXPCHRIS"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478376"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1478376.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FFEXPCHRIS" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1654905ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1654905" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478376">FFEXPCHRIS</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-28">09/28/22 13:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells good, this is definitely for the cooler seasons, I live in South Florida, so this fragrance doesnt get too much wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1654905"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1654905#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1654242" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1654242" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scotty123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1204142"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1204142.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scotty123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zaharoff/Signature-Pour-Homme-56744.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56744.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Signature Pour Homme"title="Signature Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1654242ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1654242" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1204142">Scotty123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-27">09/27/22 15:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got this in yesterday and used it today at work, I sprayed it on at 5am and here it is 6pm and its still going strong on my skin. So the performance is EXCELLENT, this is how all colognes should perform! As for the smell its very close to the Code line by Armani mostly Code Absolu, and it does smell very close to Axe Dark Temptation but this one has lavender in it which gives it some freshness to go along with the woods, in the dry down you get an intoxicating Amber vanilla. <br />
<br />
I actually had a guy at work ask me if it was Axe that I was wearing  so Im guessing it smells more like that one than the other one previously mentioned lol great fragrance all in all and one that will work amazing in the fall and winter weather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1654242"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1654242#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1653846" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1653846" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dzarsos"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/632677"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.632677.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dzarsos" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hugo-Boss/Boss-The-Scent-Absolute-56295.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56295.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Boss The Scent Absolute"title="Boss The Scent Absolute"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1653846ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1653846" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/632677">Dzarsos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-27">09/27/22 06:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>While I've had this for a little over a year, this is only my second or third wear... bearing that in mind, here are a few thoughts:<br />
<br />
(1) As many have mentioned, this is a primarily vanilla scent, and is a close cousin to Armani Code Absolu.<br />
(2) That said, a nice, vaguely woody, funkiness in the drydown keeps this from being as "purely vanilla" as that fragrance.<br />
(3) The aforementioned "woody funk" gives the impression of a slightly more chocolatey, almost Nutella-esque shadow-scent, which I really enjoy.<br />
(4) While I am not wild about vanilla-centric and overly sweet fragrances, this one strikes a nice balance.<br />
(5) Wearing this on the first genuinely cool (40F) morning in autumn, I have a much stronger appreciation for it than I did in late spring when I purchased it.<br />
<br />
Overall, I would say that this is probably best suited to the 35-and-under crowd, and definitely has strong cool-weather evening/date-night potential within that sphere. I also think that this could be very well suited to a confident woman - particularly the office/business type. It is very pleasant and inviting, and for the right person, very much worth the price.<br />
<br />
8/10 overall - but only because I'm a bit outside of the age range for it, and it could use a bit of booze or smokiness to better suit me.<br />
---------------------<br />
Edit: I was recently given a decant of Angels' Share by Kilian, and it was such a booze-bomb that I started to feel actually hungover wearing it - remembering this review, I sprayed Invictus Victory on top of it, and, well, I was right. Booze is a great complement to this frag. Obviously, Angels' Share is MUCH too expensive to buy for layering, but something else boozy? It'd be a good combo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1653846"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1653846#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1652531" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1652531" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Roman86"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/717236"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.717236.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Roman86" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1652531ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1652531" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/717236">Roman86</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-25">09/25/22 09:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet vanilla with pepper and wood shavings is what I get. This is strictly for the cooler weather as it is a gourmand. The longevity lasts many hours. Victory smells similar to Armani Code Absolu but I think Absolu is smoother and more sophisticated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1652531"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1652531#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1652234" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1652234" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="opusxpn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1568183"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1568183.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="opusxpn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1652234ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1652234" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1568183">opusxpn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-24">09/24/22 19:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is not amazing but it is a good scent, the opening is different than what you expect. Nestle quick chocolate with some freshness. Once it dries down you get amber and vanilla but it is not overly sweet. It doesnt feel multi dimensional it feels linear or very calculated. The chocolate note disappears right away it should stay a little longer. Never tried the invictus line this is my first venture into it based on peoples recommendations. But I dont know, I like it but I dont love it. Vanilla is one of my favorite notes and this one does it really nice but it feels its missing more personality. The fragrance does not take me anywhere mentally. Just my opinion everyone has different opinions and preferences.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1652234"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1652234#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1650870" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1650870" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="marsfragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1575563"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1575563.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="marsfragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1650870ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1650870" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1575563">marsfragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-22">09/22/22 18:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im not much of a fan of Paco Rabanne, and Invictus especially, but this one is really good. In the opening I get a scent similar to the original Armani Code, but much warmer. However, I think this fragrance is at its best in the dry down. It becomes this sweet ambery scent is just so addicting. The performance is very good, with great longevity and strong projection. I would throw away all the other Invictus and stick with this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1650870"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1650870#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1641165" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This smells so good and performs like a monster. Huge compliment puller and attention grabber. The vanilla and lavender with pepper and amber is done so well, this is one of my favorites all time its that good. Ladies love this one too and it will get their attention. You cant miss wearing this </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1641165"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1641165#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1641106" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1641106" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Napasonoma"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1197637"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1197637.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Napasonoma" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Uomo-Born-In-Roma-Intense-78740.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78740.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Intense"title="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1641106ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1641106" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1197637">Napasonoma</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-08">09/08/22 16:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This a really nice fragrance, it definitely has the Armani Code DNA a cross between Profumo and Absolu. But for me it takes the best qualities of both. I get great performance on my skin. No matter what the fragrance is, the will always be hatters and bashers. This gets a 4.10 out of 5 out of nearly 1000 vote so 80%+ love this. So if you like the Code DNA but with a real nice twist with a little spice and freshness you will enjoy this. I personally would not consider this a gourmand, it has some sweetness in the dry down but it is accompanied by some incense and a touch of freshness with a hint of spice hanging in there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1641106"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1641106#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1638462" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1638462" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wolfen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1563972"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wolfen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1638462ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1638462" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1563972">Wolfen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-04">09/04/22 21:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First time I wore it the pure and simple vanilla base stuck around in such a tasteful way for hour after hour. Definitely one of if not the best in the entire Invictus line. Simple composure of notes, well layered from the top to bottom, lasts very long without an aggressive lingering nature seen in other potent fragrances. The way the top fades into the mid and then into the base is very smooth. All around a solid fragrance from Paco Robanne and definitely a great option for cool/cold weather. A solid recommendation for those that enjoy warm/soft-sweet fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1638462"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1638462#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1637087" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1637087" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vikkinca"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345893"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1345893.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vikkinca" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1637087ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1637087" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345893">Vikkinca</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-03">09/03/22 03:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Alluring lemon, chocolate, vanilla fragrance. The best in the line; one that doesn't belong in it. Victory doesn't share the Invictus DNA, but after all, what's in a name? <br />
<br />
This is a stunning, delicious gourmand fragrance. Ideal for the cooler seasons and date nights. Lasts around 10 to 12 hours on me. The closest fragrance I can liken Victory to would be Armani Code Absolu, but it isn't as fresh. The dry-down has a bit of pencil-shavings woodiness, but the vanilla remains lemony. Another winner from Paco Rabanne</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1637087"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1637087#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1634291" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; they r totally the same.. nothing but Vanilla</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1630403"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1630403#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1629496" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1629496" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lwhaymand"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298290"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1298290.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lwhaymand" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1629496ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1629496" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298290">lwhaymand</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-23">08/23/22 02:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Both my girlfriend and I said this independently of each other: it's too sweet, and smells like a women's fragrance. Most sweet men's fragrances are balanced out with spices, woods, resins etc. With Victory, you get a tiny touch of fougre in the opening from the lavender, and a bit of spice from the pepper, but the overwhelming note is vanilla. There are far, far better cold weather or evening fragrances out there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1629496"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1629496#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1625592" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1625592" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Seanmesser666"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496942"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1496942.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Seanmesser666" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1625592ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1625592" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496942">Seanmesser666</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-17">08/17/22 12:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first I was completely in love with this fragrance. It's very good especially if you can find for a great price. I don't like as as much as I used to but it's still 1000% worth the pickup and when I run out I will buy again</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1625592"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1625592#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1623508" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its not mind blowing, but its not as bad as some are saying it is. If you like sweet scent, this is for you.<br />
<br />
Scent: 7/10<br />
Longevity: 6.5/10<br />
Sillage: 6.5/10<br />
Bottle: 7/10<br />
Value for money: 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1623508"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1623508#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1622349" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; a easy 10/10, there isnt anything in its league from other head designers imo as far as gourmand. If you put a spray on your chest shirt neck area and one on each wrist is well well well enough but if you wanna sex bubble do all 4 points o the neck and pulse points and joints on arm 10 or so sprays youll get a headache prolly.
