Its fresh and sweet, smooth, sensual and masculine. And not done a thousand times. I imagine a young man wearing it. A biker type. A kind-hearted rebel. Good choice for date nights. <br />
Thumbs up!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1607602"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1607602#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1605161" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1605161" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="K_Wood_22"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480864"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="K_Wood_22" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-Parfum-73664.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73664.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Most Wanted Parfum"title="The Most Wanted Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1605161ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1605161" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480864">K_Wood_22</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-17">07/17/22 20:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I generally like gourmand/vanilla fragrances. So I blind-bought Victory, based on numerous reviews stating it was a vanilla gourmand fragrance and smelled better than the other offerings in the Invictus line. <br />
Unfortunately, my skin rejects this fragrance. Horribly. Something in this quickly turns into a burned rubber and fecal smell that never fades. I'm assuming they either used indole to mimic vanilla, or it's whatever chemical they used for the amber note. Whatever it is, it smells absolutely revolting on me. <br />
Don't waste your money on a blind-buy on this, like I did. Try before you buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1605161"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1605161#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1598555" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1598555" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Steveparadox"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447790"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Steveparadox" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rochas/Moustache-Eau-de-Parfum-52350.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52350.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Moustache Eau de Parfum"title="Moustache Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1598555ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1598555" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447790">Steveparadox</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-07">07/07/22 13:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This does remind me of Armani Code Absolu and Armani Code Profundo. The way the vanilla combines with the slight sharpness of citrus and subtle peppery note is very reminiscent of the Armani Code fragrances. I think Invictus Victory is better though in my testing. It seems to have better performance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1598555"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1598555#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1587640" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1561894" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rob321x"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1247142"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1247142.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rob321x" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovoy-Paris/Pavillon-Rouge-51660.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51660.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pavillon Rouge"title="Pavillon Rouge"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1561894ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1561894" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1247142">Rob321x</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-11">05/11/22 16:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do not like any invictus frags. But this one was a surprise, shares a lot of similarities to Armani code absolu upon the initial spray, then i start getting a chocolate vanilla bomb even tho chocolate is not listed in the notes, it sure smells like its in this. I can see why people may not like this fragrance but if you are into sweet gourmand scents than you will like this!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1561894"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1561894#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1558590" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1558590" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Savatage79"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1185947"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1185947.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Savatage79" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hugo-Boss/Boss-Bottled-Parfum-75183.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75183.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Boss Bottled Parfum"title="Boss Bottled Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1558590ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1558590" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1185947">Savatage79</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-06">05/06/22 16:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After wearing it since launch id still say this is easily one of the best Invictus releases, however platinum is really getting me those feels. But I just have had this on lately and it's one of the best 2021 releases, a must own.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1558590"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1558590#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1550924" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1550924" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mjchaelj"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330577"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1330577.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mjchaelj" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Trudon/Absolu-96547.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96547.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Absolu"title="Absolu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1550924ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1550924" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330577">Mjchaelj</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-25">04/25/22 23:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really love this. Beautiful chocolatey vanilla gourmand. This is definitely a deviation from the other flankers, but is my favorite of the line. That being said, I feel like it smells too much like Armani Code Absolu, which I own, so I find this redundant. Still its really good. <br />
<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1550924"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1550924#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1548923" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1547313" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scentsibilities"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1286339"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scentsibilities" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Red-Tobacco-46663.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46663.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Red Tobacco"title="Red Tobacco"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1547313ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1547313" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1286339">Scentsibilities</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-20">04/20/22 12:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fantasic gourmand fragrance very rich and has depth it's often compared to a chocolate cake but I see it differently.This is much fresher on my skin it comes across like a lemon vanilla cake, with a smoky hint in the background from the incense.<br />
<br />
Its beautiful and imo niche quality especially in the air its a stunning scent not too cloying.Happy to have this in my collection and will cherish it in my collection amongst the other great dark oriental gourmand I own.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1547313"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1547313#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1544764" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1544764"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1544764#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1542478" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1542478" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Houdini4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.607493.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Houdini4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Indemodables/Vanille-Havane-Coeur-de-Oud-96892.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96892.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"title="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1542478ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1542478" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493">Houdini4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-13">04/13/22 07:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What can I say about this?<br />
I'm one of the few fragrance snob reviewers who actually liked the original Invictus (for a little bit anyway) in the current climate it started (or was a prominent milestone in) the philsophy of more is more, four perfumers and even more notes and accords than you could shake a fouled stick at, then came the inevitable flankers. <br />
Funny how 'Invictus flanker' rhymes with 'massive wanker' because that's what you look like in the gym or on a youtube video with your tinnie-tiny, trophy, cup. The Aqua one people raved about was garbage, come on? it was!!!<br />
Then there's this. <br />
I hadn't bothered trying it as I don't with many nowadays, but I sprayed this recently and was surprised how non repulsive it was. I got a kind of light top of aromatic, modern biz, then a light, non intrusive vanillic thing quite soft and round, not my usual bag but not instantly dismissible. <br />
No Victory is dismissible after about 20 mins or so when it settles down to a holocaust of atrocious accords floating in a dead vanilla soup, it is truly awful perfume. What an idiot I was humming those opening bars like some buffoon listening to shitty music on the radio, that's the sort of crowd mentality which gets these perfumes made. <br />
Yeah it's safe to say I don't like it. <br />
I'm not just being mean and snobby I just don't get the point of this stuff, it's like the conflict I get in perfumes like cedrat boisee another work of Satan himself. (Sorry that's melodramatic) it's more like the work of a demon perhaps?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1542478"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1542478#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1541852" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1541852" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hendrafellany"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1288764"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1288764.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hendrafellany" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Tony-Iommi-Monkey-Special-70789.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70789.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tony Iommi Monkey Special"title="Tony Iommi Monkey Special"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1541852ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1541852" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1288764">hendrafellany</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-12">04/12/22 07:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An absolutely gorgeous flanker that I prefer over the og. Its dark, rich, sweet but yet is somehow kinda fresh. Good projection and performance. A solid 9 out of 10 for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1541852"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1541852#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1539039" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1229646">Bear Claws</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-07">04/07/22 19:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Skin scrubber for me, I could not handle it, the more it sat on the skin the more I hated it, it has this unpleasant sweetness mixed with some kind of industrial compounds or even womens cosmetic/make up products mixed with lemon which made it so much worse,  I could not detect much nor enjoy any familiar smell of vanilla or tonka because that other stuff just swallowed the whole profile. Def NOT mass appealing or easy to wear product.  TEST IT TEST IT TEST IT first before buying (Im so thankful I did). Chances are you will hate it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1539039"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1539039#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1538771" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/387355">Arunas.K</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-07">04/07/22 11:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Did you know that this is basically a clone of a budget fragrance called Dark Temptation by Axe/Lynx. It was pretty awesome. <br />
<br />
Don't see why one should buy this for premium as long as Dark Temptation is available? 70-80 percent resemblance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1538771"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1538771#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1531602" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1531602" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lukas100298"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1461644"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1461644.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lukas100298" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Red-Tobacco-46663.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46663.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Red Tobacco"title="Red Tobacco"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1531602ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1531602" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1461644">lukas100298</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-27">03/27/22 12:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What can I say... This is just a piece of Art if you are into Gourmand Scents. It's very sweet and pleasant to smell.<br />
<br />
Longevity in this one is very good on skin and it lasts for at least 2 days on my clothes. Price is also very good if you are able to grab large bottles for a discount <br />
<br />
Over all I'd say it's s solid 9.5/10 </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1531602"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1531602#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1531144" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1531144" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="masongap"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1054997"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1054997.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="masongap" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1531144ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1531144" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1054997">masongap</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-26">03/26/22 18:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells very familiar. If you take Coca Cola Vanilla and mixed it with an aquatic, you get Invictus Victory. <br />
<br />
This opens up pretty sweet like Paco Rabane Pure XS but as it dries down you notice there is aquatic undertones to it, a ozonic freshness. Through and through it is still a dark fragrance but can work on summer nights. The scent overall is pleasant, but I feel like this one is not sure if it wants to be a fresh fragrance or a sweet and sensual date night fragrance. Its mingling in the middle so it is left competing with very strong fragrances on both camps. <br />
<br />
Projection is good for 1st hour and longevity is above average. OG Invictus still projects better in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1531144"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1531144#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1529707" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1529707" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Eriyou"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1425245"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1425245.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Eriyou" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/Stallion-Leather-79237.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79237.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Stallion Leather"title="Stallion Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1529707ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1529707" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1425245">Eriyou</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-24">03/24/22 12:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I cannot get enough of this! Love at first sniff. A memory encapsulated with the scent. Vanilla rounded so well with pepper and citrus notes. Smooth as butter with an amazing balance of nuanced scents. It works! Some may only smell vanilla and thats a shame because there is so much more to it than that and I believe they just don't understand note breakdowns. I've worn this more than anything lately and backup bottle worthy. A must try!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1529707"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1529707#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1527874" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Over all I'd say it's s solid 9.5/10 </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65177"comment_id="1531602"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-65177.html?ccid=1531602#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1372641" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1372641" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iliveyellow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1225468"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="iliveyellow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gant/Gant-13640.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13640.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gant"title="Gant"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1372641ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1372641" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);     <div class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 0.5em;"><span>Perfume Encyclopedia</span></div>
<div>Perfumes: <b>98,519</b><br/>

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
